title: Wells Fargo analysts ordered 75 identical burrito bowls from 8 different Chipotles...
content:
Wells Fargo analysts ordered 75 identical burrito bowls from 8 different Chipotles and found that portion sizes varied wildly. The biggest bowl was almost 2x heavier than the smallest. Wild that they donâ€™t standardize this from a cost perspective.
